S31640-025_syn_2: OPERATIVE SUMMARY: [REDACTED] with near-complete obstruction of the left mainstem bronchus. Rigid bronchoscopy was undertaken. The bulky tumor was mechanically debulked utilizing the beveled tip of the rigid bronchoscope for coring, followed by forceps extraction. Final airway contouring was achieved with a microdebrider. No thermal energy was applied. Hemostasis was secured with epinephrine and saline lavage.
